CustomField.description: The Contact is not receiving emails since: 1. They don't have an email in the system &/or 2. all their emails are "not active" (see "Email not used for Comms' Sends" field on email records) &/or 3. "Do Not Contact/Email" boxes are checked for Contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Contact is not receiving emails since: 1. They don't have an email in the system &/or 2. all their emails are "not active" (see "Email not used for Comms' Sends" field on email records) &/or 3. "Do Not Contact/Email" boxes are checked for Contact.
CustomField.label: Doesn't Receive AJWS Emails
